channel.title: [Writing]Help me! I need an idea! A Topic!
channel.description:
I'm suppose to write about an incident that changed my view on life. Something that is important to write about. Some experiences that taught me something. I can't think of anything. So I'm hoping to just get an idea and get this over with..
It has to be like an adventure, or something interesting that happened where you work. While implementing the above.
Thanks so much. It's 12 am and I'm in dire need of idea! xD
- WhiteShadow

item.title: [Writing]Help me! I need an idea! A Topic!
item.dc:creator: @jcs_double jcs_double
item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

what about the day you discoved runescape cheating?
just throw in some five-sylable adjectives and bam!

Read full topic
